positive: the government is doing too many things better left to businesses and individuals
it's not the government's job to protect people from themselves
everyone has it in their own power to succeed

The government is doing too many things better left to businesses and individuals.
It's not the government's job to protect people from themselves.
Everyone has it in their own power to succeed.
The obstacles that once made it harder for women than men to get ahead are now largely gone.
People being too easily offended by things others say is a major problem in this country.
White people do not benefit much or at all from advantages in society that Black people do not have.
U.S. policies should try to keep it so America is the only military superpower.
The government should do more to solve problems.
The economic system in this country unfairly favors powerful interests.
Tax rates on large businesses and corporations should be raised.
The federal minimum wage should be raised to $15 an hour.
A lot more needs to be done to ensure equal rights for all Americans regardless of their racial or ethnic background.
There are still significant obstacles that make it harder for women to get ahead than men.
In foreign policy, the U.S. should take into account the interests of its allies even if it means making compromises with them.
Voting is a fundamental right for every adult U.S. citizen and should not be restricted in any way.
